    // valores de fspy
    var position = new Vector3(
        0.18784794530183724,
        1.9739462945243829,
        -9.8162332928140721
    )

    //valore de fspy
    var rotation = new Quaternion(
        -0.006622578946030994,
        0.9973299721615903,
        0.07221223907339011,
        0.00862905580404167
    )
